meanings.definition: To be helpful or useful to achieve a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: Eating healthy subserves your goal of staying fit.
meanings.sent3: Drinking water subserves the mission of quenching thirst.
meanings.sent4: Education subserves as the key to unlocking opportunities.
meanings.sent5: Sleeping well subserves a productive day ahead.

meanings.definition: To serve as a means to an end.
meanings.sent1: Teamwork subserves success in many projects.
meanings.sent3: Laughter subserves as a bridge to joy.
meanings.sent4: Patience subserves as the foundation for resilience.
meanings.sent5: Kindness subserves positive relationships with others.
